titles: Dido and Aeneas the fourth booke of Virgils Aeneis now Englished by Robert Stapylton Esqr
author: Virgil.
Droeshout, John, d. 1652, engraver.
Stapylton, Robert, Sir, d. 1669.
publisher: Printed for William Cooke at Furnivalls Inn gate in Holborne,
notes: The title page is engraved and signed: John Droeshout sculp.
A1v bears a verse explanation of the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
